com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb

Class RecipientMB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.AbstractMB<Recipient,java.lang.String>
      • com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.RecipientMB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @SessionScoped
 @Named(value="recipientMB")
public class RecipientMB
extends AbstractMB<Recipient,java.lang.String>
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents the recipients managed bean, which is the main managed bean for this system. This is an extended class from the AbstractMB class.
    Since:
    1.5
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tranquilo Dognini Neto
    See Also:
    AbstractMB, Serialized Form
